mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(groupUrl, groupName, area, bankName, accountNumber, AccountHolder, userId, foundationDay, introduce) VALUES(#{groupUrl}, #{groupName}, #{area}, #{bankName}, #{accountNumber}, #{AccountHolder}, #{userId}, #{foundationDay}, #{introduce})
INSERT INTO manager(userId, name, birth, pwd, gender, tel, email) VALUES(#{userId}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{pwd}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{email})
